title: VTL - REST to CRUD
description: API Gateway REST to CRUD operations via direct integration with DynamoDB

introBox.headline: How it works
text: These snippets demonstrate Create/POST and Read/GET operations using direct integration between API Gateway and a DynamoDB table.  The snippets use API Gateway mapping templates to transform generic JSON to DynamoDB formatted JSON and back.  The template code should work with any DynamoDB table with attribute types listed in the first snippet.
